ModMetaData.name: Stargates! to Skipgates!
ModMetaData.author: Gaeus
ModMetaData.description: An update to MrKociak excellent retexture : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2846471252. This mod integrate the content of the Stargates! mod by CCYT and the retexture of MrKociak in a vanilla friendly way.
